Dao Wiz

Ivan Douwes Online
Co-creating a beautiful future!
Everything I create is devoted to inspiring humanities culture, arts and technology to all move in sync with nature toward an abundant and healthy future for all species and eco-systems.

The future is always growing one way or another... Be intelligent, put the natural world first, create a harmonious society and technologies. May all else rest in peace.
